name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (florentin881)
description:
This is Tic Tac Toe

While it looks simple it really took a few days to make in unity's engine

Also Stay Tuned for more updates

WARNING!

Avast may Find it as a "virus" don't worry it's not a virus but for some reason it thinks it is You can still ignore it And if you're still unsure you can use a virtual machine to test it
